alert.note: Alert for Faribault (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 28 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Faribault County through 345 PM CDT... At 315 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Elmore, or 21 miles east of Fairmont, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Frost around 330 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Bricelyn. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between mile markers 124 and 133. U.S. Highway 169 between mile markers 1 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
